name: B. Game with modulo
statement:
Vasya and Petya are going to play the following game: Petya has some
positive integer number a. After that Vasya should guess this number
using the following questions. He can say a pair of non-negative integer
numbers (x, y). Petya will answer him: "", if (x
bmod a)
geq (y
bmod a). "", if (x
bmod a) < (y
bmod a). We define (x
bmod a) as a remainder of division x by a.Vasya should guess the number
a using . Petya has a number, that satisfies the inequality 1
leq a
leq 10^9.Help Vasya playing this game and write a program, that will
guess the number a.
